pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Ormond Beach
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Ormond Beach. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Casey Wealth Advisors of Raymond James

heroDescription: Ormond Beach, Florida, is a vibrant coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and rich history.
landscapeDescription: The economy of Ormond Beach is primarily driven by tourism, healthcare, and retail. The city benefits from its proximity to larger metropolitan areas, enhancing its economic prospects.
uniqueNeeds: Focus on sustainable tourism and healthcare services to meet the growing population's needs.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Ormond Beach's tourism reliance poses economic risks; diversify into tech and healthcare. Real estate is vulnerable to hurricanes and market fluctuations; consider flood-resistant investments.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Ormond Beach has seen a steady economic growth rate of 3.5%, driven by tourism and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Ormond Beach is approximately $60,000, reflecting a stable middle-class community.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Ormond Beach are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and estate management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Ormond Beach is about 5% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Ormond Beach has seen a 10% increase in home values over the past year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Ormond Beach's business climate is favorable, with low taxes and incentives for small businesses, fostering growth.
